long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Observe IQ empowers organizations to maximize the potential of their ERP systems through comprehensive observability, ease of ongoing support, seamless adoption, and insightful analytics, driving operational excellence and strategic decision-making.
This Chrome extension facilitates user to seamlessly capture the user journeys for whitelisted ERP URLs in form of recordings, screen captures and provides ease of reporting bugs with seamless integration with various tools. Additionally, Observe IQâ€™s Chrome extension has built-in support repository which will allow user to access the possible solutions in case an error occurs. It also gives access to help documents repository which will help in a smooth adoption of the ERP system.
